===========
Development
===========

Please use the Github `issue tracker <https://github.com/lucydot/effmass/issues/>`_ for feature requests and bug reports. 

If you would like to contribute please do so via a pull request. All contributors must read and respect the `code of conduct <https://github.com/lucydot/effmass/blob/master/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md>`_. In particular, we welcome contributions which would extend `effmass` so that it is able to parse output from other electronic structure codes.
